import React from 'react'; import PieChart from '../../components/Chart_Components/PieChart'; import {Row, Col,Accordion, Card,Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {SliderPicker } from 'react-color'; import { useState } from 'react'; const PieChartView = ()=>{ const [x_grid, set_x_grid] = useState(true); const [y_grid, set_y_grid] = useState(true); const [title_size,set_title_size] = useState(30); const [font,set_font] = useState('Raleway'); const [color,setcolor] = useState("#234400"); const [color2,setcolor2] = useState("#124490"); const Pie_data = { labels: ['Red', 'Blue', 'Yellow', 'Green', 'Purple', 'Orange'], datasets: [ { label: '# of Votes', data: [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)', ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)', ], borderWidth: 1, }, { label: '# of Votes', data: [14, 29, 31, 21, 21, 3], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)', ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)', ], borderWidth: 1, }, { label: '# of Votes', data: [24, 29, 21, 11, 11, 3], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)', ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)', ], borderWidth: 1, } ], }; const PieCustomize = { type: 'doughnut', responsive: true, plugins: { title: { display: true, text: 'Products with most number of sales in a given period', font: { size: title_size, family: font, // Your font family } }, }, }; return (
Customize the Graph
Modify Chart Show X Axis Grids {set_x_grid(!x_grid)}} /> Show Y Axis Grids {set_y_grid(!y_grid)}} /> Step Size X {set_x_step(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={5} min='2' max='50' /> Step Size Y {set_y_step(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={5} min='2' max='50' /> Change the Colors Color For Attribute 1 {

} Color For Attribute 2 Show Y Axis Grids Modify the Text Title Size {set_title_size(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={30} min='10' max='50' /> Titile Font Family {set_font(e.target.value)}}>
); } export default PieChartView; const PieCustomize = { };
